name: Last Line of Defense
description: What hope will the mankind have if this line of defense is breached?

name: Laurel Wreath
description: Crown made of green leaves and fragrant flowers. It's very refreshing to wear.

name: Lava Gem
description: Wow, the jewel looks as beautiful as flowing lava! Wow, it is hot! Hot! Hot!

name: Lava Poring Candy
description: A candy in the shape of Lava Poring, with a burning taste. Within 1 minute, the fire damage you suffer will reduce by 100%. This effect cannot stack up with other Poring candies, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Lavender Pale Purple
description: Use to redeem job Costume Lavender Pale Purple at "Prontera" Costume shop

name: Laziness Accessory
description: Really makes you want a lazy and quiet snooze.

name: Lazy Poring
description: Praised as the continent's most popular monster three times in row, the touching feeling is even more comfortable than touching the cat! All Poring have a puzzle: after eating and sleeping, why do you always hit me?
